        Throws:

      • engageCombat

        public Position[] engageCombat(Position pAttack,
                               Position pDefend)
        engageCombat() is used when two pieces of different teams are in the same position. They inflict each other their strength until someone (or both of them) die. This method update vitality. If the defender is frozen, the defender die and the attacker suffers no damage.
        Parameters:
        pAttack - the position of the piece that is going to move on another piece
        pDefend - the position of the piece whose place is going to be occupied by another piece
        Returns:
        an array of Positions. The first element of the array is the position of the attacker if it died (otherwise is null), The second element is the position of the defender if it died (otherwise is null).

      • engageCombat

        public int[] engageCombat(Piece attacker,
                          Piece defender,
                          int attackerVitality,
                          int defenderVitality)
        engageCombat() is used when two pieces of different teams are in the same position. They inflict each other their strength until someone (or both of them) die. WARNING: this method does not update vitality WARNING: this method does not check if the are frozen pieces
        Parameters:
        attacker -
        defender -
        attackerVitality - attacker current vitality
        defenderVitality - defender current vitality
        Returns:
        an array of vitality. The first element of the array is the vitality of the attacker (0 if it died), The second element is the vitality of the defender (0 if it died)

      • updateUnusedSpells

        public void updateUnusedSpells(Piece.Team currentTeam,
                               char spell)
        This function set to '0' the char within the unusedSpells array at the position relative to the spell passed. It used to track the used spells once they are been used.
        Parameters:
        currentTeam - Team that use the spell
        spell - Spell used by the team currentTeam

      • updateUnusedSpells

        public void updateUnusedSpells(char spell)
        This function set to '0' the char within the unusedSpells array at the position relative to the spell passed. It used to track the used spells once they are been used. The current team is automatically set.
        Parameters:
        spell - Spell used
